attributes.action: build another water park in the former wet n wild Newcastle site
attributes.additional_details: Build another water park similar and or as the new biggest water park site in the uk
attributes.background: The wet n wild water park opened in 1992 has recently been demolished which shut in 2020 when covid started everyone in the north east loved this site and had a good time throughout the years of it being opened and people miss it and say they would like to see it reopen as it’s a childhood memories
